Class Administrator

java.lang.Object
People
Member
Administrator
public class Administrator
extends Member
The class Administrator inherit from Member. It defines club's administrator and methods used by them. It inherit form Member because an Administrator operate member's activities and other functions that only an administrator can do.

  • Method Details

    • insertPeopleClub

      public int insertPeopleClub​(java.util.List<People> l, People p, java.lang.String pers)
      Method used by administrator to insert a person into the club.
      Parameters:
      l - It is the list where People will be inserted.
      p - It is the member or administrator to insert.
      pers - It is a string that defines the role.
      Returns:
      It is used to exit from the method.

    • deletePeopleClub

      public int deletePeopleClub​(java.util.List<People> l, People p, java.lang.String pers)
      Method used by administrator to remove a person from the club. This method also call another method to remove from all activities the person who is removed from the club.
      Parameters:
      l - It is the list where People will be removed.
      p - It is the people to remove.
      pers - It is a string that defines the role.
      Returns:
      It is used to exit from method. People.deleteFromAllActivities(People)

      Method used by administrator to modify member's data.
      Parameters:
      p - Member or Administrator whose data needs to be modified.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException
